quote: Alcohol has its own well-know defects as a medication for depression but no one has ever suggested - ask any doctor - that it is not the most effective anti-anxiety agent yet known.
quote_letters: ALCOHOL HAS ITS OWN WELL-KNOW DEFECTS AS A MEDICATION FOR DEPRESSION BUT NO ONE HAS EVER SUGGESTED - ASK ANY DOCTOR - THAT IT IS NOT THE MOST EFFECTIVE ANTI-ANXIETY AGENT YET KNOWN
